articles.description: The research focuses on chemical recycling which uses the constituent elements of the plastic to make new materials
articles.content: London: Scientists have found a way to recycle plastics to create high value materials such as carbon nanotubes, which can not only conduct heat and electricity but also help reduce plastic waste. Wh… [+2311 chars]

articles.title: INNOVATION: Novel device creates electricity from snowfall - ETEnergyworld.com
articles.description: The device designed by researchers at the University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA) is inexpensive, small, thin and flexible like a sheet of plastic.
articles.content: Los Angeles: Scientists have designed a first-of-its-kind 3D-printed device that can produce electricity from falling snow. The device designed by researchers at the University of California, Los Ang… [+2894 chars]

articles.author: ET EnergyWorld
articles.title: Wind farm 'predator' effect hits ecosystems: study by Indian Institute of Science - ETEnergyworld.com
articles.description: An international team of scientists studied the effects of wind turbine use in the Western Ghats, a UNESCO-listed range of mountains and forest spanning India's west coast region and a global "hotspot" of biodiversity.
articles.content: Paris: Wind farms act as a top "predator" in some ecosystems, harming birds at the top of the food chain and triggering a knock-on effect overlooked by green energy advocates, scientists said Monday.… [+3215 chars]
